result.eng: They tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.

result.eng: Among the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.

result.eng: A prayer for neighbours who are among the dead.

result.eng: They are all among the dead.
